name: JAHYB
description:
A small dinosaur emerges from its egg in a strange place. Mom is not there. The little dinosaur believes he can find his mother, so he decides to go to find her despite his dangers.

2D platformer and adventure game, where character moves from one field to another walking and flying. his defying enemies and obstacles.

Currently in development and will be released 29th of November.

Created during Jestercraft game development course Fall 2017.
